text: Survey of India () is the national Indian institute of geodesy and cartography. It was established in 1767. It is in New Delhi. The Survey of India is also responsible to others organizations such as: * Survey of India Service * Archaeological Survey of India (ASI) * Botanical Survey of India (BSI) * Cartography of India * Geological Survey of India (GSI) - maintains 2 fossil parks currently * Linguistic Survey of India * Zoological Survey of India (ZSI) == Other websites == * Official website of the Survey of India * Directory of Indian Government websites Category:National mapping agencies Category:New Delhi Category:Government of India
title: Survey of India
